text: Am I not able to use drag-and-drop in developing a theme? I am using the code offered here: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/tutorials/creating-a-drag-and-drop-area>
I think I just realized that `dnd_area` cannot be used in a module, it can only be used in the layout of a page :disappointed:
I wanted to use DND in modules to build aweosome dynamic stuff but is not possible .

Hm, seems like a missed opportunity.
I guess many, like us, would want to use the built-in DND, together with custom modules. But only limit the DND to a specific module.

Just throwing some additional support behind supporting text as a theme setting. I was really surprised to discover it doesn’t work, since that seems like such a natural choice (e.g., a global tagline)

Hey <@UMCBG6QK0>, i would think global content would actually be a better way of doing tagline content. With global content content creators could hover over the module containing the text and edit it in the page editor.
If that doesn't work well for your use case I'd love to hear what you're aiming to do that global content doesn't solve well for

But if we’re talking about strings that can be repeated in multiple pieces of global content (like a tag line, phone number, sales email, etc. might be), doesn’t that still mean updating them in multiple places?
Not if you simply build smaller modules. For example say your company phone number was in the header and the footer. The same module could do both. I do hear what you're saying though.
